verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Blindman stood by the road and he cried (x3)
He cried - Oh - Oh - Oh
show me the way
Show me the truth
Show me the life and the way to go home

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Jesus hung on the cross and he died (x3)
He died - Oh - Oh - Oh
He is the way
He is the truth
He is the life and the way to go home

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Jesus clap,clap,clap,clap,clap
(x3)
Oh - Oh - Oh
JESUS!
